greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Sum(k>=0, x^(2^k)) + 1/(1+x). First differences of A007456 (gossip sequence) for n>1.
comment: For n>1: a(n) = 2, if n is power of 2; a(n) =- 1, if n odd; a(n) = 1 otherwise.
The absolute values of a(n) for n>=2 equal the q(n) sequence of the Eta triangle A160464. - _Johannes W. Meijer_, May 24 2009
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65536
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Apr 06 2003
ext: Erroneous formula removed by _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 14 2017
